Class DataCenterSystem

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.DataCenterSystem

extends java.lang.Object

    • Method Detail

      • fillAndAsignate

        public void fillAndAsignate()
        Initialize each room with the basic information that the user does not provide.

      • generateList

        public java.lang.String generateList​(boolean condition,
                                     boolean windowB)
        Create a list of available rooms.
        Parameters:
        condition - If this condition is true, only the list of rooms that are in windows or those that are not can be displayed.
        windowB - It expresses whether a room is sought in the window or not.
        Returns:
        The list that will be displayed to the user on the screen.

      • registerUser

        public java.lang.String registerUser​(java.lang.String userId,
                                     java.lang.String companyName)
        Register an user in the system.
        Parameters:
        userId - String that represents the nit of a company or the registration number of a project.
        companyName - Name of the company that will be in the room, if it is a project, the company will be "ICESI".
        Returns:
        Message that validates the correct registration of the user or shows an error if any data was entered incorrectly.

      • rentRoom

        public java.lang.String rentRoom​(java.lang.String companyName,
                                 java.lang.String userId,
                                 int roomNumber,
                                 java.lang.String rentalDate)
        Assign a project a room.
        Parameters:
        companyName - The name of the company that will be in the room, "ICESI".
        userId - String that represents the registration number of a project.
        roomNumber - The room to which the values will be modified and assigned to the project.
        rentalDate - The date the rent is made.
        Returns:
        Message that validates the correct rent of a room or shows an error if any data was entered incorrectly.

      • rentRoom

        public java.lang.String rentRoom​(java.lang.String userId,
                                 int roomNumber,
                                 java.lang.String rentalDate)
        Assign a company a room.
        Parameters:
        userId - String that represents the nit of a company.
        roomNumber - The room to which the values will be modified and assigned to the company.
        rentalDate - The date the rent is made.
        Returns:
        Message that validates the correct rent of a room or shows an error if any data was entered incorrectly.

      • initServer

        public java.lang.String initServer​(int roomNumber,
                                   int serverNumber,
                                   int hostedServers,
                                   double cacheMemory,
                                   int numberOfProcessors,
                                   double ramMemory,
                                   int numberOfDiscs)
        Initialize a mini room Server.
        Parameters:
        roomNumber - The mini room to which the server belongs.
        serverNumber - The number in the room's server array to initialize.
        hostedServers - The number of servers housed in the room.
        cacheMemory - The cache that the server will have.
        numberOfProcessors - The number of processors the server will have.
        ramMemory - The RAM that the server will have.
        numberOfDiscs - The number of discs the server will have.
        Returns:
        Message that validates the correct initialization of a server or shows an error if any data was entered incorrectly.

      • initProcessor

        public void initProcessor​(int roomNumber,
                          int serverNumber,
                          int processorNumber,
                          int brand)
        Initialize a server processor.
        Parameters:
        roomNumber - The mini room to which the processor belongs.
        serverNumber - The server to which the processor belongs.
        processorNumber - The processor number in the server's array to initialize.
        brand - Is the processor's brand.

      • initDisk

        public void initDisk​(int roomNumber,
                     int serverNumber,
                     int diskNumber,
                     double diskCapacity)
        Initialize a server disk.
        Parameters:
        roomNumber - The mini room to which the disk belongs.
        serverNumber - The server to which the disk belongs.
        diskNumber - The disk number in the server's array to initialize.
        diskCapacity - Is the capacity of the disk.

      • validateCancelation

        public java.lang.String validateCancelation​(java.lang.String nit,
                                            int roomToCancel)
        Asks the company to verify if they want to cancel the rental of a room, showing their processing capacity.
        Parameters:
        nit - Company's nit.
        roomToCancel - The room that the company is about to cancel.
        Returns:
        A message asking the company if you really want to cancel your rental.

      • cancelRoom

        public java.lang.String cancelRoom​(java.lang.String userId,
                                   int roomToCancel)
        Cancel the rent of a room for a user.
        Parameters:
        userId - String that represents the nit of a company or the registration number of a project.
        roomToCancel - The room that the user wants to cancel.
        Returns:
        Message that validates the correct the correct cancellation of the rental or shows an error if any data was entered incorrectly.

      • validateMassiveCancelation

        public java.lang.String validateMassiveCancelation​(java.lang.String nit)
        Asks the company to verify if they want to cancel the rent of all the rooms, showing their total processing capacity.
        Parameters:
        nit - Company's nit.
        Returns:
        A message asking the company if you really want to cancel the rent of all the rooms.

        Returns:

        Returns:

        Returns:

      • powerOff

        public java.lang.String powerOff​(java.lang.String desiredLetter,
                                 int position)
        Power off the building rooms based on a letter entered by the user.
        Parameters:
        desiredLetter - The letter entered by the user.
        position - If the user chooses the letter m or p, it will be the row or column that they want to turn off.
        Returns:
        A success message.

        Parameters:
        registryNumber - The project registration number.
        Returns:
        The room number.

      • searchForRoomNumber

        public MiniRoom searchForRoomNumber​(int roomNumber)
        Search for a room based on its room number.
        Parameters:
        roomNumber - The room number.
        Returns:
        If it finds the room it will return that object, otherwise it will return null.
